name: CUBIC VISITOR DEMO
description:
Cubic Visitor

... Is a simplistic open-world puzzle game. You play as a cube from a distant world.
Explore strange lands and solve puzzles and mysteries along the way.

Development

In this demo you're confined to the beginning of the game, but my team and I are working on  eventually releasing a full game on steam.  We're eager to share our game with the world, and appreciate any feedback you might have. Follow developement @vwarrior99.
